availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Military board for enrolling recruits for the enrollment branch of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau. Established by the United States War Department on March 3, 1863. Abolished on August 28, 1866.

ab.bibl: "Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War)," Guide to Federal Records in the National Archives of the United States, National Archives, https://www.archives.gov/research/guide-fed-records/groups/110.html#110.3.1 (accessed June 18, 2020).
